Headline: #95 95th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 91st/Burley
ShortDescription: Eastbound 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd and Buffalo: due to street blockage near 91st/Burley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd and Buffalo: due to street blockage near 91st/Burley.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #74 Fullerton Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Fullerton/Lorel
ShortDescription: Eastbound #74 Fullerton buses are temp. rerouted via Fullerton, Laramie, Diversey, Central and Fullerton, due to fire department activity near Fullerton/Lorel.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #74 Fullerton buses are temporarily rerouted via Fullerton, Laramie, Diversey, Central, then resume their normal route on Fullerton, due to fire department activity near Fullerton/Lorel.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
